meaningMnemonic: If a <radical>tsunami</radical> hits a <radical>pirate</radical> they are going to <kanji>sink</kanji> no matter how good of a pirate captain they are.
readingMnemonic: As the tsunami comes to <kanji>sink</kanji> the pirate, the pirate holds his <reading>chin</reading> (ちん) up high. He will die with dignity.
